models
Class TwitterBean

java.lang.Object
  models.TwitterBean

public class TwitterBean
extends java.lang.Object

TwitterBean.java This is a model class to handle the twitter connection and other major twitter queries including getting a user's timeline and the retweeters of a particular tweet

Author:
BSG Team

getTimeline

public java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> getTimeline(java.lang.String name)
Gets the twitter timeline of a particular user

Parameters:
name - screen name/twitter id of the user
Returns:
an array list containing up to the 100 most recent tweets of the user

getRetweeters

public java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> getRetweeters(java.lang.String tweetID)
Gets the retweets of a particular tweet

Parameters:
tweetID - the id of the tweet
Returns:
an array list of the retweets (up to 10) of the tweet passed to it
